nodes.text: T8 was a location at which some mines were situated during the time of Clone Wars.

After the Human Night Wren was captured by the Thaereian military, the Heroes of Cularin—a group of freelance agents from the Cularin system—set out to travel to Thaere Privo and rescue her. They disguised themselves as Thaereians and en route they stopped over at the moon T-4, and for a time, it seemed to the agents that the Thaereian workers they were traveling among were going to be transported to the mines at T8.

T8 features in the role-playing module Night's Homecoming, and is mentioned in a narrative section that relates to a possible way by which the player characters can travel to Thaere Privo. The scenario does not reveal the nature of what T8 is.
